Developed by Kiss Sándor Ádám

n: the number of elements in the generated array
m: the maximum possible value in the array
Results are in seconds!

Heap sort algorithm:
          n \ m               2               4              10            1000
             10    0.0000015965    0.0000017088    0.0000018611    0.0000018632
            100    0.0000197414    0.0000362470    0.0000421565    0.0000448657
           1000    0.0001393269    0.0003817914    0.0004532766    0.0004567114
          10000    0.0007810121    0.0019911326    0.0024031490    0.0026091468
         100000    0.0036996451    0.0162887805    0.0246416692    0.0310924005
        1000000    0.0298979913    0.1711818657    0.2763492445    0.3571429393
